Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Education

Items.Title: Oversight - Implementation of UPK and 3K Expansion and the Transition of EarlyLearn NYC to DOE.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Implementation of UPK and 3K Expansion and the Transition of EarlyLearn NYC to DOE.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Education

Resolution calling upon the City of New York to eliminate the disparity in compensation paid to teachers, staff and directors at community-based EarlyLearn NYC centers, as compared to the compensation paid to Department of Education instructors for similar employment.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Eliminate the disparity in compensation paid to teachers, staff and directors at community-based EarlyLearn NYC centers, as compared to the compensation paid to DOE instructors for similar employment.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Cohen, Barron, Ulrich, Brannan, Levine, Rose, Ampry-Samuel, Cornegy and Deutsch.

Items.Title: Oversight - Implementation of UPK and 3K Expansion and the Transition of EarlyLearn NYC to DOE.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Implementation of UPK and 3K Expansion and the Transition of EarlyLearn NYC to DOE.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the City of New York to eliminate the disparity in compensation paid to teachers, staff and directors at community-based EarlyLearn NYC centers, as compared to the compensation paid to Department of Education instructors for similar employment.
